About the Company: Eastern Treads Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing of quality pre-cured tread, cushion/bonding, gum and black vulcanizing cement.The company`s product range includes Tread Rubber,Eastern Range of Repair Patches,Eastern Hot Rubber- Slab and Camel Back Treads and Bonding Gum and Black Vulcanising Cement.
